desc: At The Game Store, we take board games seriously. From Catan to Magic, from Pokémon to Dungeons & Dragons, Cards against Humanity to Flesh and Blood TCG card game we’ve got what you’re looking for. Explore new and existing titles from the best in the business. The Game Store is the true home of gaming in Dunedin.

layout.text: See the games our staff love, working in a gamestore lets hope they know what they're talking about!
